word: "Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompense of reward. For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise" [Hebrews 11:35, 36]. Do the work of God diligently and in faith. "Press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus" [Philippians 3:14]. --Ms. 3, 1890.
